title: kate spade new york: places to go, people to see
features: kate spade new york: places to go, people to see

focuses on the how, where and why of travel through the lens of the always-inspired kate spade new york girl. this new volume features vibrant photography, old-world glamour, a dash of charm and inspirational quotes, tips and words of wisdom that every kate spade new york girl should know.
kate spade new york: places to go, people to see

showcases chic destinations such as paris, new york city, the amalfi coast, marrakech, tokyo, and st moritz, along with ways to incorporate those things seen, heard and experienced into life back home
. kate spade new york: places to go, people
to see will have you booking a plane ticket the moment you finish turning the pages!
description: “A funny and witty read with just the right amount of sass to get us through the day fashionably. Full of inspiring quotes, amusing tips, and words of wisdom for when you need them.”―
Since its launch in 1993 with a collection of six essential handbags,

has always stood for color, wit, optimism, and femininity. Today, it is a global lifestyle brand synonymous with joy, delivering seasonal collections of handbags, ready-to-wear, jewelry, footwear, gifts, home décor, and more. Known for its rich heritage and unique brand DNA, kate spade new york offers a distinctive point of view and celebrates communities of women around the globe who live their perfectly imperfect lifestyles. kate spade new york is part of the Tapestry house of brands.
